DC CODE ยง 26-551.08

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Board shall be organized, shall operate, and may establish committees under such rules and bylaws as the Board establishes.
The Board shall meet at least twice a year and at the call of the Commissioner.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Organization and operation of the Board.
